text: The Canon Challenge was a golf tournament held in Australia between 1993 and 2001. Prize money was A$250,000 in 1993, A$300,000 in 1994 and $350,000 in 1995. In 2001 Paul Gow set an Australasian tour record with a first-round score of 60. ==Winners== {|class=wikitable style="font-size:95%" !Year !! Winner !! Country !! Venue !! Score !! To par !!
